Tesla - Distributed Systems Engineer (all levels) - Onsite (Palo Alto) - Full Time The Firmware Build & Infrastructure team within Vehicle Software is looking to hire a Distributed Systems Engineer to join us and work on the platform powering CI builds for all vehicle software devs, including all customer builds.

Our stack includes a heavy dose of python, with a number of items in typescript/react, go, and ruby, plus jenkins & slurm usage and a couple hundred bare metal machines powering our compute cluster.

If you like distributed systems and breaking stuff in new and unique ways, come join us! :)
